data.title: Miss Thistlebottom's hobgoblins : the careful writer's guide...
data.text:
APA Citation, 7th Edition (style guide)

Bernstein, T. M. 1. (1991). Miss Thistlebottom's hobgoblins: the careful writer's guide to the taboos, bugbears, and outmoded rules of English usage . Noonday Press.

Chicago / Turabian - Author Date Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Bernstein, Theodore M. 1904-1979. 1991. Miss Thistlebottom's Hobgoblins: The Careful Writer's Guide to the Taboos, Bugbears, and Outmoded Rules of English Usage. Noonday Press.

Chicago / Turabian - Humanities (Notes and Bibliography) Citation, 17th Edition (style guide)

Bernstein, Theodore M. 1904-1979. Miss Thistlebottom's Hobgoblins: The Careful Writer's Guide to the Taboos, Bugbears, and Outmoded Rules of English Usage Noonday Press, 1991.

MLA Citation, 9th Edition (style guide)

Bernstein, Theodore M. 1904-1979. Miss Thistlebottom's Hobgoblins: The Careful Writer's Guide to the Taboos, Bugbears, and Outmoded Rules of English Usage Noonday Press, 1991.
